alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 29 at 2:47PM EDT until March 30 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON AND EARLY EVENING... .Strong winds and low relative humidity Wednesday afternoon into early Wednesday evening will cause any fires that occur to spread rapidly. Please refrain from open burning and report any fires that you may see. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM EDT WEDNESDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHEAST KENTUCKY INTO SOUTH CENTRAL OHIO... The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM EDT Wednesday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 064 Pickaway, Fire Weather Zone 065 Fairfield and Fire Weather Zone 099 Mason. * WINDS...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Avoid burning. Conditions are favorable for rapid fire growth.
